column4: hey I'm trying to change some notification icons, i have replacements but they're actually in .png format, all the howtos I've read involve .svg's
anyone know how to change notification area icons, I know they're stored in /usr/share/icons, but not sure how to go about replacing them
there are program that convert pixel images into vector, but they're usually not that good. in inkscape you will have to manually trace it.
and inkscape has a built-in tracer, too
